metadata.Title: CVE-2021-24036 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Passing an attacker controlled size when creating an IOBuf could causeinteger overflow, leading to an out of bounds write on the heap with thepossibility of remote code execution. This issue affects versions of follyprior to v2021.07.22.00. This issue affects HHVM versions prior to 4.80.5,all versions between 4.81.0 and 4.102.1, all versions between 4.103.0 and4.113.0, and versions 4.114.0, 4.115.0, 4.116.0, 4.117.0, 4.118.0 and4.118.1.

criterions.comment: hhvm package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
